body_content.explanation: opposed to new ideas or to systems that encourage change in society or in the way that things are done:
examples: He considers himself to be a very conservative person - anti-progressive and resistant to change.
The coalition is anti-progressive - they do not believe in moving forward.

body_content.explanation: An anti-progressive tax system is one in which the rate of tax is not higher on larger amounts of money:
examples: He has a conservative anti-progressive tax position.
